decision_conditions: The amendments to the approved application listed below are considered to be of a minor nature and acceptable in their own right and will not require resubmission of a fresh planning application.
The following amendments are deemed to be accepted:
- removal of front chain link fence and replacement wooden fence to match the existing fence to the front of the property and as shown on drawing no. 7698/110

- replace all existing fencing to the car park area with new fence to match the existing fence to the property 1200mm close board fence with a 450mm trellis to the top as per the current fence per fence detail shown on drawing no. 7698/110 and in the arrangement shown on the layout plan submitted with this application
- Omit pedestrian footpath/access gate from the road and increase planting to match approved to infill this area

description: Application for a non-material amendment to planning permission ref: P1185.22 dated 14/10/2022 to allow for removal of front chain link fence and replace with new wooden fence to match the existing fence to the front of the property, replace all existing fencing to the car park area with new fence to match the existing fence to the property, consisting of a 1200mm close board fence with a 450mm trellis to the top as per the current fence, remove the proposed foot path and new pedestrian gate from the road to the car park as this will not be required. (Variation of Condition No. 2 of Planning Permission ref P1331.19 dated 08/07/2020 to permit an increase in timeframe from 3 months to 12 months (Retrospective application for the retention of 12 No. bed spaces and a communal area within the roofspace, and the retention of two x 2 inset windows in place of 4 Velux roof windows. Including the submission of details in respect of parking provision, Landscaping, and external works.))
